short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Best All-in-One Toolset to Enlighten and Elevate your Amazon Business!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ZonGuru⁠⁠—the best all-in-one software toolkit to elevate your Amazon business!
 
As Amazon sellers, we know that having the right data is essential to finding the perfect product to sell on Amazon.
 
With the ZonGuru Chrome Extension, you can now research product categories with speed and ease, getting a fast, 360-degree look at any live product niche. 

See how easy it is to be successful in any category when you have an inside look at product prices, bestseller ranks, reviews, ratings, estimated sales and more⁠—for any listing on Amazon!

Using ZonGuru’s exclusive Niche Rater function, you get an exact rating for the product categories you’re interested in, so you’ll know whether you’ve found a winning category… or a dud not worth spending your valuable time and money on.

It calculates the opportunity of a category based on over a year of strenuous R&D, combining feedback from hundreds of successful sellers to generate an overall Niche Score made up of four key metrics: Buyer Demand, Competition Opportunity,  Investment Sweet Spot, and Revenue Potential.

The ZonGuru Chrome Extension also features a built-in Profit Calculator, so you can quickly understand not only potential revenue, but potential profit for products you consider. 

Simply tap the new profit widget, input estimated costs for things like packaging, storage, or shipping, and immediately see the potential for this product to be a winner.

To get started, install and open our Chrome Extension tool and run a search on Amazon⁠—it’s that easy.
 
See for yourself. Start your product research with ZonGuru today!
